Bendera is a resident of the Mariakani area of the Coast province in Kenya. She owns a food business which deals in selling of fish. She has been in the business for five years. She is a married mother of seven children.

Bendera was introduced to Milango by her friends and is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenyan shillings to purchase fish for sale. The challenge that the business faces is high transport and price fluctuations.

She will use the extra income from the loan to pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: To buy fish for sale.

loans.name: Carolina Lisett

texts.es:
Doña Carolina, reside en la capital del folklore nicaragüense, Masaya, ella es viuda, comerciante, tiene la edad de 48 años, su núcleo familiar lo conforman ella y su tres hijos. 

Su negocio consiste en la elaboración y venta de enchiladas y tacos en el mercado, posee su negocio desde  hace dos años y medios, el cual ha sido su medio de subsistencia, debido a que el apoyo con que contaba la dejo de tener al fallecer su esposo y se vio en la necesidad de salir adelante y gracias a eso ha sacado adelante a su familia junto con su hija. 

Doña Carolina es una ama de casa, persona honrada y trabajadora que conoce el valor de ser independiente, su día de trabajo comienza al levantarse a la tres de la mañana a  elaborar las enchiladas y tacos,  junto con su hija mayor que le ayuda,  para estar lista a las ocho de la mañana que es cuando sale a su puesto de trabajo a vender, posterior cuando ella termina la mercadería del día se regresa a su hogar para cuidar de sus hijos mas pequeños. Comenta que comenzó el negocio con capital propio, las ventas que realiza son de contado y sus clientes son transeúntes del mercado.

Actualmente  tiene la necesidad de reparar su cocina, que con el pasar del tiempo se le a deteriorado la infraestructura, por tal razón requiere de un financiamiento para la compra de materiales de construcción para el mejoramiento de su cocina, y del que es su medio de trabajo porque es ahí donde  elabora sus alimentos diario de su familia como los de su negocio como son tacos y enchiladas.

 Solicita el crédito para la compra de  arena, piedrín, cemento blanco, y mano de obra, de tal manera que le de mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Carolina lives in the capital of Nicaraguan folklore, Masaya. She is a widow and a saleswoman. She is 48 years old and and has three children. 

Her business consists of making and selling enchiladas and tacos in the market. She has had the business for two and a half years. It has been her means of support, since she lost the income of her husband when he died, and she had to move forward. Thanks to her business she has brought her family forward, together with her daughter.  

Mrs. Carolina is a homemaker, an honorable and hard-working person who knows the value of being independent. Her work day starts when she gets up at three in the morning to make enchiladas and tacos, together with her oldest daughter who helps her. They have to be ready at eight in the morning, which is when she leaves her workplace to begin selling. Later, when she finishes her day at the market, Mrs. Carolina returns home to care for her younger children. She started the business with her own money. Her sales are in cash, and her clients are the people who pass by in the market. 

Currently, she needs to repair her kitchen. The infrastructure has deteriorated as time passed. For this reason, she needs the loan to buy construction materials to repair her kitchen, which is her means of work because it is where she makes the daily food for her family as well as the tacos and enchiladas for her business.  

She is requesting the loan to buy sand, stone, white cement, and labor. In this way she will improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sand, white cement, stone and labor.

loans.name: Santos Luis

texts.es:
El Señor Santos  de 63  años, vive con su esposa en su casa de habitación ubicada en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, en la zona sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 04 años a la venta de material  como ser arena y tierra para adobes etc.
Don Santos su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa y sus clientes son los vecinos y amigos que a diario le visitan
Don Santos está solicitando el préstamo para compra de arena y tierra, porque tiene que entregar unos pedidos de material.  Con el apoyo de este préstamo el pretende suplir la necesidad de financiamiento para su negocio y  de igual forma mejorar sus ingresos.
Don Santos su sueño es comprarse más maquinarias para sacar material.
 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril del 2013
texts.en:
Santos, 63, lives with his wife in his house located in the San Lorenzo community in the southern part of Honduras. 

For the past four years he has sold materials such as sand and soil for bricks etc. 

Santos's business is located in his house and his clients are neighbors and friends who visit him daily. 

Santos is asking for a loan to buy sand and soil because he has to deliver some orders. 

With the help of this loan he will be able to finance his business and improve his income. 

His dream is to buy equipment that will extract sand and soil.  

 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - April 2013

loans.use: to buy sand and soil for his business.

loans.name: Tapitha

texts.en:
Tapitha is a 24-year-old single businesswomen. She has been selling new clothes in her shop for a period of about three years with an income of approximately KES 18,000 a month.

She is taking her second loan from KADET LTD after successfully repaying the previous one. She wants to use the loan to buy more clothes in bulk and sell them. 

The loan she was advanced has helped her boost her business and she  has increased her profits. She hopes to build her own house and buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy more clothes in bulk and sell them.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace lives in the Likoni district of Coast Province, Kenya. She is married and has three school-going children. She owns a grocery shop--a business which has been running for one year. In the business, she sells foodstuffs, household goods, etc. She also sells charcoal. She learned about Milango through friends who invited her to the group and she joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenges are inflation and bad debts.

Grace is applying for a loan of 74,450 Kenyan shillings to buy retail stock e.g. maize, beans, rice and cooking fat. The extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to improve upon the living standard of her family and pay school fees for her children. She aspires to open a mini wholesale store.

loans.use: To buy retail stock e.g. maize, beans, rice and cooking fat.

loans.name: Anne

texts.en:
Anne lives outside of Kakamega town, in Kakamega county. Kakamega county is located in Western Kenya and is famous for having the only tropical rain forest in the country. Most farmers in Kakamega grow maize, but sugarcane, papaya, bananas and tea are also popular crops. The variety of crops grown in the region, as well as the abundance of vegetation in the old growth forest, make Kakamega particularly attractive for beekeeping.

Anne is married, and has three children. Both she and her husband have been farming for more than 20 years. Anne is currently tending dairy cows, raising poultry and growing vegetables on her land. She is excited to start beekeeping for two main reasons: the bees do all of the work, and she loves eating honey.

This is Anne's first loan, and she plans to use the income generated by her beehives to buy even more hives. In the future, Anne hopes to see her grandchildren "grow up well."

loans.use: to buy beehives for honey production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to machinery and materials

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya. She is a married mother of three school-going children. She runs a clothes shop which has been operating for two years. She employs one person in the business. She also runs a pool machine from which customers play the pool table games.

Janet was introduced to Milango by her friends and joined to access credit. She is applying for a loan of 52,250 Kenyan shillings to purchase a new pool table.

Janet believes the income from this loan will help her educate her children. As well, she is focused on owning a wholesale shop despite the challenge of the high cost of stocks from suppliers making most of her items beyond the public's reach.

loans.use: To purchase a new pool table.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
Hamisi is a resident of Likoni, Kenya. He is a married father of six school-going children. Hamisi is a businessman who purchases cattle, rears them and sells them for meat or to other farmers. He has been in the business for the last six years. He also runs some rental houses.

Hamisi was introduced to Milango by his friends and joined to access credit for business funding. He is applying for a loan of 52,250 Kenyan shillings to purchase animals, especially goats, to sell. He believes the income from this loan can help him to provide his children with an education.

loans.use: To buy goats to sell.

loans.name: Luisa Ercilia

texts.es: Doña luisa, madre de tres hijos ya todos mayores de edad y trabajadores, es un gran orgullo  que tiene ella y su esposo porque de manera humilde, pero han sabido encaminar a sus hijos quienes la apoyan incondicionalmente, doña luisa siempre se dedica a su negocio la venta de comida y obtiene el apoyo de su esposo quien ahora es jubilado, su meta es seguir manteniendo el mismo ritmo de trabajo ya que es su único medio de ingresos, que le ayuda a sufragar los diferentes gastos del hogar, por eso solicita este crédito para invertir con mas productos de carnes, granos básicos, verduras y frutas para los refrescos.
texts.en: Luisa is the mother of three adult, hardworking children, who she and her husband are very proud of.  They raised them humbly but they support them unconditionally.  Luisa sells food and has her husband’s support.  He is retired now.  Her goal is to continue this work routine because it’s her only source of income and it helps her pay the various household expenses.  She is asking for this loan so that she can buy more products, such as meats, basic grains, vegetables, and fruits for her drinks.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, fruits, and vegetables.

loans.name: San Martin De Porres Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Maria del Rosario, tiene 45 años de edad, forma parte del grupo "San Martin de Porres" integrado por 6 socios.
María del Rosario, hace cinco años inició su negocio de venta de comida, el cual realiza todos los días, prepara sus alimentos en su casa y luego lo reparte a domicilio o de lo contrario se contacta con trabajadores de obras y construcciones y les lleva la comida.
Su negocio va creciendo poco a poco y le ayuda a solventar los gastos familiares.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para la preparación de sus alimentos, estos insumos los podrá comprar a precio por mayor para que le cueste menos y así pueda obtener mayor ganancia.
texts.en:
Maria del Rosario is 45 years old and a member of the “San Martin de Porres” group, made up of six members.

Maria del Rosario started a food business five years ago and works it daily.  She makes the food at her home and then delivers it to her customers’ homes or gets in touch with laborers and construction workers and takes food to them.

Her business has been growing little by little and it helps her pay her family expenses.

She will use the money from this loan to buy ingredients for her food.  This will allow her to buy them at bulk prices, so it will cost her less and she can increase her income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Minor

texts.es:
Minor es un joven que se dedica a varias labores comerciales entre ellas la entrega de gas propano a domicilio, él ha formado una importante clientela y ya necesita de un medio de transporte para hacer dichas entregas, además de ofrecer este servicio en su propia comunidad también quiere expanderse a otras poblaciones cercanas . Está solicitando un millón de colones exactos (¢1.000.000) para adquirir una motocicleta y trasladar el producto a los diferentes lugares.
Minor se siente complacido de contar con este financiamiento que le ayudará según sus palabras a lograr sus objetivos.
texts.en:
Minor is a young man who does several different things.  Among them is home delivery of propane gas.  He has important customers and needs a means of transportation to make his deliveries.  Aside from this service in his own community, he wants to expand to other nearby areas.  He is asking for a loan of a million colones (¢1.000.000) to buy a motorcycle to be able to travel to different areas.

Minor feels completed by this loan that will help him achieve his goals.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Minor

texts.es: Minor es padre de tres hijos, vive en el pacífico sur del país, su negocio consiste en  distribuir gas profano en los locales comerciales que se dedican a la  venta de productos de consumo diario. El cuenta con una gran cantidad de cilindros (recipientes) que lleva a la compañia de gas para recargarlos e iniciar su distribución. Para comprar más líquido y aumentar su clientela necesita un crédito de un millón de oolones (¢1.000.000), con esto logrará atender más comedrcio y por supuesto incrementasr sus ingresos.
texts.en: Minor is the father of three children and lives in the southern part of the country.  He delivers propane gas to merchants who sell food.  He has many cylinders that he takes to the gas company to be recharged and distributed.  He needs a loan of one million colones (¢1.000.000) in order to buy more liquefied gas so he can increase his customers.  This way he can make more sales and, of course, increase his income.

loans.use: to buy propane.

loans.name: Reza

texts.en:
My name is Reza and I come from a family of two siblings: a brother in high school and a younger sister in kindergarten.  Currently I am in my third year, studying BBS-Actuarial Science in the School of Finance and Applied Economics at Strathmore University. I am pursuing a career as an actuary and my grades so far have been good. I am applying for the Kiva loan so as to complete the two remaining years of my Bachelor's degree.

My parents are struggling to meet the fees for me and my brother in secondary school because they both don't earn enough, but would like to see me get a quality university education given by Strathmore. 

The Kiva loan repayment is friendly because it spreads the repayment out over a longer period, compared to the three installments required by Strathmore University for every year of a degree. The KIVA loan would assist me greatly in paying my tuition fees over the remaining academic years of my course. This would enable me to study hard and go through the course without missing any classes or exams because of unpaid fees.  I appreciate Strathmore University for all the assistance I have received in applying for this loan.

I commit to paying back the loan on time and to give back in the future to other needy cases so as to continue the spirit initiated by Kiva.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees in order to complete an undergraduate course in Bachelor of  Business Science in Actuarial Science.

loans.name: Ángela María

texts.es:
Ángela de 48 años de edad, es ama de casa y madre de dos hijos. Los cuales son su mayor prioridad y la razón de su existencia. Toda la vida se dedicó a cuidar de su familia mientras su esposo generaba la provisión para el hogar. Desde hace varios meses decidió colaborarle a su esposo con los gastos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Comenzó vendiendo productos por catálogo, actividad que le ha generado buena rentabilidad, por lo cual aún continua ejerciéndola. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de productos de belleza y pijamas con el fin de aumentar sus ventas.
Espera que con dicha inversión genere los ingresos suficientes para ingresar a su hijo menor a la universidad.
texts.en:
Angela is 48 years old and is a housewife with two children, and they are her main priority and reason for living.  All her life she has decided to care for her family while her husband generated the household income.  A few months ago she decided to help her husband with the expenses and improve the family’s quality of life.  She started selling products via catalog, which has provided good profits so she continues to do it.  She is asking for a loan to buy beauty products and pajamas so she can increase her sales.

She hopes that this investment will generate the income needed to sign her youngest son up for university.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: Edwin de 25 años de edad, se ha dedicado a las labores agrícolas desde su infancia, asegura que el campo es su mejor paraíso. Desde niño aprendió de la actividad gracias a su padre y tíos. Se dedica a la siembra de cultivos de yuca, ñame y maíz, labor que realiza diariamente de seis de la mañana a una de la tarde. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de cerdos con el fin de alternar las dos actividades y mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitirá garantizarle a su esposa y a sus tres hijas menores de una mejor calidad de vida y una vivienda digna.
texts.en: Edwin is 25 years old and has been farming since he was a boy.  He says that the fields are his greatest paradise and learned this activity when he was a boy, thanks to his father and his uncles.  He raises yucca, yams, and corn and works every day from six in the morning to one in the afternoon.  He is asking for a loan to buy pigs so that he can diversify his activities into two and increase his income.  This will allow him to guarantee a better quality and dignified life to his wife and children.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
Irene de 61 años de edad es una emprendedora quien inició su propio negocio con el fin de generar una fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento y la educación de su hijo, debido a su condición de madre soltera. 
Irene se dedica a la venta de productos por catálogo desde hace más de diez años, actividad que realiza desde su vivienda. Hoy se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía, con el propósito de aumentar sus ventas y generar mayores ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén.
texts.en:
Irene is 61 years old and an entrepreneur who started her own business in order to create a source of income to support her son’s education.  She is a single mother.

Irene sells catalog via catalog and has for ten years.  She works out of her home and is asking for a loan so that she can buy merchandise so she can increase her sales and generate greater income.  This will allow her to improve her quality of life and achieve her dream of having her own store.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Lilia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Lilia del Socorro de 45 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de mercancía especialmente insumos para la confección en diferentes municipios de Antioquia, Colombia. Laboró con su padre en el desarrollo de la actividad y hace unos meses falleció por lo cual Lilia se hizo cargo del negocio. 
Asegura que las ventas siempre le han llamado la atención, y después de separarse de su cónyuge y con un hijo que sostener decidió pedirle empleo a su padre. Hoy el negocio le corresponde por herencia, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de de telas con el fin de satisfacer la demanda. 
Espera que con dicho préstamo pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y brindarle a su hijo la oportunidad e ingresar a la educación superior.
texts.en:
Lila de Socorro is 45 years old and sells clothes making supplies in different neighborhoods in Antioquia, Colombia.  She worked with her father in developing the business but he passed away a few months ago.  This left Lilia in charge of the business.

She says that she has always been attracted to sales and after having separated from her husband and having a son to support, she decided to ask her father for work.  Now that she has inherited the business, she is asking for a loan so she can buy fabric to satisfy her customer demand. 

She expects that this loan will allow her to improve her family’s quality of life and provide her son the opportunity to begin a higher education.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: María Nubia

texts.es:
Nubia de 49 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa  y productos Amway a familiares, amigos y conocidos, este negocio surgió gracias su gran pasión por la moda y las ventas. Actualmente, Nubia labora sola y con su amabilidad y alegría ha logrado fidelizar a sus clientes. Con el ánimo de seguir con su negocio, verlo crecer y cumplir con los pedidos solicitados, requiere de la compra de mercancía y productos de belleza Amway, artículos que le permitirán satisfacer las necesidades de su hogar. 
En un futuro próximo, Nubia desea tener su propio almacén y apoyar a sus dos hijos menores para que accedan a la educación superior.
texts.en:
Nubia is 49 years old and sells clothing and Amway products to family, friends, and acquaintances.  This business began thanks to a great passion for fashion and sales.  Currently, Nubia works alone and her happiness and friendliness has allowed her to gain faithful customers.  With a desire to get ahead and continue with her business, watch it grow, and meet her customer demands, she needs to buy merchandise and Amway beauty products.  This will allow her to satisfy her household needs.

In the future, Nubia wants to have her own store and support her two children obtain a higher education.

loans.use: to buy clothing and beauty products.

loans.name: Ana Sagrario

texts.es: Ana, tiene 54 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, tiene 4 hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes junto a su esposo y una nieta. Ana lleva 10 años de dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de comidas y refrescos, vende desayunos, almuerzos y comidas rápidas como pastelitos, baleadas, tajadas con carne etc.. El negocio lo tiene establecido en el mercado local. Ha obtenido 19 ciclos de prestamos con ODEF con los cuales a podido mantener estable su negocio. Actualmente esta solicitando otro por 10,000 lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de insumos como carnes, refrescos, condimentos,verduras etc.para la elaboración de comidas y en refrescos para la venta. Su meta es tener siempre una estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Ana is 54 years old, in a common law marriage, has four children, and lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes with her husband and a granddaughter.  She has been making and selling food and drinks for ten years.  She sells breakfasts, lunches, and fast food such as meat pies, baleadas, sliced meat, etc.  Her business is at a local market.  She has had 19 previous loans through ODEF and they have allowed her to maintain a stable business.  Now she is asking for a loan of 10,000 Lempiras to buy supplies such as meats, soft drinks, condiments, vegetables, etc. to make food and drinks for sale.  Her goal is to always be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop to use for his studies.

loans.name: Diana's Group

texts.en:
This group is made up of seven women who trade in various commodities, including slippers, underwear, cutlery sets, wax prints, palm fruits, onions, and eggs. 

Mary (standing, extreme left in the photograph) is a member of the Diana's Group. She is 60 years old, and has five adult children.  Her husband died when she was 50 years and she is currently living in the house the husband left for her and the children. Her major source of income is the selling wax prints, shoes, and slippers. She hawks these to customers, and sells to them.

Mary wants this loan to buy more wax prints and shoes to sell to customers. She sells to her customers in Teshie and Nungua towns; she has been in this business since 2006. 

Her dream is to make sure all children are place well in the society before she dies. 

Mary together with Agnes, Diana, Juliana, Helen, Rita, and Gladys need GHS 4,300 to increase stock and satisfy customer demands.

loans.use: To buy more wax prints, shoes, and slippers to sell.

loans.name: Kolu

texts.en:
Kolu is 27 years old and lives in Paynesville, which is one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is living together with her fiancee and has two children, aged 1 and 7 years. Only one is attending school. Kolu, herself, is a university student. She is good at managing her business. Her fiancee is a builder.

For the past two years, Kolu has been selling body spray, soap, cream, etc., in the local market. Now she faces no problems; she sells every day and spends 12 hours per day on her business. She started this business with a little capital that she had received from her fiancee. She is requesting a loan to purchase more body spray, soap, cream, etc., to resell at her business. She hopes to build her own house.

loans.use: to purchase more body spray, soap, cream, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Chasquis Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CHASQUIS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por siete  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Isidora es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: hilado de lana de alpaca, venta de chamarras deportivas, venta de mochilas, costura de chamarras, tejido de awayos, venta de tucumanas, tejido de mantas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Isidora es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de mantas de alpaca; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años atrás, en conjunto con una amiga que tenía, actualmente ya tiene su taller propio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana) que adquirirá de las ferias comunales y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene siete hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la atención en salud.
texts.en:
The communal association “CHASQUIS” will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer (For Women) as part of the "Centro Focal de Panamericana" communal bank. The group is comprised of seven members and is governed by a Board of Directors and Isidora, their President.  The members of the communal association work in a variety of businesses including: alpaca wool spinning, selling sports jackets, selling knapsacks, sewing jackets, weaving textiles, selling meat-filled pastries, and weaving blankets. 

The loan they take out will benefit these small-business owners including Isidora. She states that this is her first time joining Pro Mujer (For Women). She became a member after being invited to do so by a Pro Mujer promoter who visited her home.  

She currently has a business weaving alpaca blankets. She began this business with a friend several years ago. She now has her own workshop.  The loan will be used to increase resources; to purchase wool from communal fairs. After using it to make her products she will sell them from her place of business. This type of work allows her to generate resources to maintain her home as best she can. She is married and has seven children. 

When people ask her why she likes Pro Mujer (For Women), her answer is that she likes its focus on health.

loans.use: to purchase wool

loans.name: Josue Onai

texts.es: Josue de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa. El posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que el realiza es excelente y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles; él es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo responsable y honesto, Don Josue esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas, y todo lo relacionado con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y asi el  podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida con su esposa.
texts.en: Josue is 42 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife. He has a tailor shop in his home where he makes different types of clothing.  Lately he has gotten many customers because he does excellent work and sells for prices that are very accessible.  He is a man who is very dedicated to his work and is honest and responsible.  Josue is asking for a loan to buy fabric, thread, needles, and everything that has to do with sewing so that he can continue satisfying his customers’ needs.  In this way he can have a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Nubia Marleny

texts.es:
Nubia de 45 años de edad, es casada y madre de tres hijos. Por la condición económica familiar, los dos deben trabajar para proporcionarle a la familia mejores condiciones de vida. En la actualidad se dedica en conjunto con uno de sus tres hijos a la distribución de productos lácteos en la localidad, actividad que alterna con la fabricación de arepas, las cuales son distribuidas en tiendas y mercados autoservicios. Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una parrilla, un fogón de gas e insumos, con el propósito de aumentar su producción.
Su mayor deseo es acceder a la compra de una vivienda para ofrecerles a sus hijos una vida digna.
texts.en:
Nubia is 45 years old, married, and has three children.  Both she and her husband have to work to provide for the family due to financial conditions.  She and her husband, along with one of their sons, sell milk products in the local area.  She also makes bread and delivers it to stores and self-service markets.  She is asking for this loan to buy a grill, a cylinder of gas, and supplies so that she can increase her production.

Her greatest desire it so buy a house so that she can offer her children a decent life.

loans.use: to buy a grill and gas.

loans.name: Rodrigo Alexander

texts.es: Rodrigo de 34 años de edad. Trabaja como independiente en la venta de mercancía desde hace 15 meses. Gracias a su esfuerzo y disciplina estableció su negocio en un local. Allí comercializa calzado y prendas de vestir. Labora diariamente de ocho de la mañana a ocho de la noche. La idea de crear empresa surgió gracias a la oportunidad que tuvo de acceder a una capacitación gratuita para formar emprendedores. Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el objetivo de adquirir surtido  y comprar las nuevas colecciones del mercado. Su mayor sueño es mejorar la calidad de vida familiar y expandir su negocio hasta convertirla en una multinacional.
texts.en: Rodrigo is 34 years old and for the past 15 months has been working on his own, selling merchandise.  Thanks to his effort and discipline, he set up a business where he sells shoes and clothing.  He works daily from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm.  He got the idea to start this business because of the opportunity he had to attend a free training session for entrepreneurs.  Now he is asking for a loan so that he can buy inventory and buy new collections.  His greatest dream is to improve his quality of life and grow his business until it becomes a multinational company.

loans.use: to stock his store.

loans.name: Beldis Yolanda

texts.es: Beldis, tiene 44 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos y vive con ellos en una aldea de San Francisco, Atlántida. Ella estableció su propio negocio de sala de belleza en su casa, desde hace 4 años y presta el servicio de tintes, manicure, iluminaciones, tratamientos, peinados, alisados, secados y corte de pelo para damas. También vende producto de belleza. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo que es por 15,000 Lempiras el cual lo utilizara para comprar producto de belleza como tintes, tratamientos, cremas para cabello, champú etc. Para uso del salón y vender  a los clientes. Con los préstamos va  mejorando la atención a los clientes. Su objetivo es siempre sacar sus hijos adelante y tener mejor el negocio.
texts.en: Beldis is 44 years old, a single mother, has three children and lives with them in a suburb of San Francisco, Atlantida.  She set up her own beauty salon in her home four years ago and provides services such as tints, manicures, highlights, treatments, hairstyles, smoothing, washes, and women’s cuts.  She also sells beauty products.  She is asking for a second loan in the amount of 15,00 Lempiras which she will use to buy beauty products such as tints, treatments, hair creams, shampoos, etc. to use in her salon and also to sell to her customers.  The loans allow her to improve her customer service.  Her goal is to always get her children ahead and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Luisa Veronica

texts.es: Luisa Veronica 41 año de edad,  casada con dos hijos, originaria de Chichigalpa, zona donde predomina el ron la caña y azúcar, luisa es trabajadora permanente de uno de los ingenios de nuestro país, con muchos esfuerzos ha logrado ir mejorando su vivienda, ya que su salario no le permite acondicionarla mejor. luisa desea embaldosar cuartos ya que estos estan hondos y realizar ciertas mejoras en el techo de la vivienda, uno de sus sueños es terminar de mejorar su vivienda y seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que estos terminen sus estudios y puedan tener una mejor oportunidad en la vida, ella esta solicitando credito para la compra de cemento, arena, cal, piedrin, zin, entre otros materiales, ella esta muy agradecida con los inversionistas kivas por al ayuda que les brinda a personas de bajos recursos econimicos.
texts.en:
Luisa Veronica is 41 years old. She is married with two children. She is from Chichigalpa, an area known for rum and sugarcane. Luisa has a permanent job in one of our country’s sugar refineries. Her great efforts have enabled her to do up her home gradually, as her salary does not allow her to do so. Luisa would like to tile the rooms as the floors are not even, and to carry out certain improvement works to the roof. 

One of her dreams is to finish the improvement works to her house and to continue supporting her children until they complete their studies and are in a position to obtain better opportunities in life. 

She is requesting this loan in order to buy cement, sand, lime, gravel, metal sheeting and other materials. She is very grateful to the Kiva investors for the help they give to people with scarce economic resources.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, such as cement, sand, lime, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Bendu

texts.en:
Bendu is 37 years old and lives in Paynesville South, which is one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 17. They are attending school, and living at home.

For the past five years, she has been selling soft drinks in the local  market. She makes more profit sometimes, but most of the time business goes slowly. She is requesting a loan to purchase more soft drinks for her business. Her plan for the future is to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Comfort  S.

texts.en:
Comfort S. lives in Paynesville South, one of most populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married with three children between the ages of 9 and 20; only two are attending school, and all of them live at home.  

For the past 19 years she has been selling biscuits, fresh  milk, candy, rice, pepper, charcoal, and oil in the local market. She makes a profit some time, but most of the time business is slow. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase more biscuits, fresh milk, candy, rice, pepper, charcoal, and oil for her business. 

Her plan for the future is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more biscuits, fresh milk, candy, rice, pepper, charcoal, and oil for her business.

loans.name: Yamah

texts.en: Yamah lives in Paynesville, which is one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is 42 years old and she is married with three children aged between 4 and 25. Her children are currently in school and live at home. For the past 3 years she has been selling palm oil, salt, onions, vita, etc. in the local market. She started this business with a little amount she received from her husband. She enjoys the buying from her customers, and money that she generates from her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil, salt, onion, vita, etc. to enlarge her business. She plans to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, salt, onions, vita, etc. to enlarge her business.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence lives in the Mombasa area of Coast Province, Kenya.  She is married and has two children. She owns a service stall which deals in the sale of tap water. 

Florence learnt about Milango through a friend. Her main challenge is an unreliable water supply, and she looks to solve this by buying a water tank.

Florence is applying for a loan of 41,850 Kenya shillings to buy a water tank. She believes that the business has improved well enough to meet the required repayments for the loan, despite the high competition, and that she will be able to effectively provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy a water tank.

loans.name: Ruth Stella

texts.es:
Ruth de 52 años de edad, desde joven ha sido una apasionada por las ventas pero se dedicó a cuidar de sus tres hijos y su esposo se hizo responsable de las necesidades del hogar. Debido  a una crisis económica que padecieron, Ruth decidió emprender camino en el sector comercial y comenzó a vender productos por catálogo, actividad que le ha dejado buenas ganancias y quiere seguir realizando, motivo por el cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía a fin de tener un stock y aumentar su volumen de ventas. 
Su mayor deseo es montar su propio local en el que no sólo distribuya productos por catálogo si no ropa y accesorios. Se siente muy satisfecha porque gracias a su labor las condiciones de vida han mejorado para su familia.
texts.en:
Ruth is 52 years old and has had a passion for sales since she was very young, but she decide to be a stay home mother while her husband was responsible for providing for the household needs.  Due to the financial crisis they suffered, Ruth decided to start a business and began selling products via catalog.  This has provided her with good earnings and she wants to continue.  She is asking for a loan to buy merchandise to have on hand and increase her sales.

Her greatest desire is to open her own store where she can not only sell via catalog, but also sell clothing and accessories.  She feels very satisfied because thanks to her work the family’s living conditions have improved.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen, tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes.  Doña María miro la necesidad de obtener ingresos para la manutención de sus hijos y hace un año decidió dedicarse a la venta de frutas de temporada y verduras. El puesto de venta lo tiene en su casa y vende a los vecinos. El préstamo que ha decidido solicitar es por 5,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en frutas, verduras y golosinas como churros, dulces y otros para vender. Su plan es aumentar las ventas y obtener ganancias para continuar con el negocio.
texts.en: María del Carmen is 58 years old, a single mother of two children, and lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes.  María saw the need to generate an income to support her children and a year ago decided to sell fruits and vegetables.  She has a stall at her house and sells to the neighbors.  She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Lempiras so she can buy fruits, vegetables, and snacks such as churros and other things to sell.  Her plan is to increase her sales and obtain earnings so she can continue her business.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra es una joven de 19 años de edad, motivada por lo sueños y las ganas de buscar un mejor futuro para sus padres. En la actualidad se dedica a laborar en una finca hotel, actividad que alterna con la venta de productos Amway con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y colaborar con los gastos de su casa. Su mayor deseo es ingresar a la universidad, sueño que cumplirá gracias a su empleo como independiente. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía con el objeto de cumplir con los pedidos que le han solicitado.
Espera que con su nuevo proyecto de negocios pueda mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 19 year old young woman motivated by dreams and a desire to search for a better future for her parents.  She currently works at a hotel and also sells Amway products so she can increase her income and contribute to the household expenses.  Her greatest desire is to attend university, which she will achieve thanks to her sense of independence.  She is asking for a loan so she can buy merchandise to fill orders.

She hopes that this business project will help her improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Sor Caridad

texts.es:
Sor Caridad, se dedica a la venta de mercancía desde hace más de 10 años, gracias a su carisma y el buen servicio goza de una clientela permanente. Con el desarrollo de su actividad ha mejorado las condiciones de vida de su familia lo que le permite sentirse satisfecha por el logro alcanzado.
Hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de ropa y accesorios, con el fin de mejorar sus ventas. 
Su mayor sueño adquirir una vivienda y montar su propia tienda de ropa, pero tiene claro que esto será un proyecto a mediano plazo.
texts.en:
Sor Caridad has been selling merchandise for ten years.  Thanks to her charisma and good service, she has steady customers.  She has managed to improve her family’s quality of life with the development of her business.  This makes her satisfied for having reached her goal.  Now she is asking for a loan to buy clothing and accessories so she can increase her sales.

Her dream is to buy a house and open her own clothing store but she knows that this will be a medium term project.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya. He is a married father of five children. He runs a cereals shop which has been in operation for three years. He is also a farmer.

James was introduced to Milango by his friends, and is asking for a loan of 21,100 Kenya shillings to buy cereals for sale.

Despite the challenge of lack of capital, James believes he can save the extra income for the education of his children, provide a means of income to the other employees and also save the extra income for future needs.

loans.use: to buy cereals for sale.

loans.name: Eduar Javier

texts.es: Eduar, tiene 22 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene un hijo, reside en una aldea de la Masica, Atlántida. Hace 4 años que Eduar alquilo un local  en la comunidad y estableció su propio negocio de venta de celulares, repuestos y accesorios, venta de achinería y reparación de celulares. El negocio se ha mantenido por su buena administración y atención al cliente. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 15,000 lempiras para surtir el negocio de mercadería para vender como ser celulares, accesorios y achinería. Con esta inversión espera aumentar las ventas y las ganancias. Su meta es que su hijo crezca sano, que pueda estudiar y que su negocio crezca cada dia más.
texts.en: Eduar is 22 years old, in a common law marriage, and has a son.  He lives in a suburb of Masica, Atlántida.  Four years ago, Eduar rented a shop in the community and set up his own business selling cell phones, spare parts, and accessories.  He sells thing for cell phones and does repairs.  He has managed the business well and gives good customer service.  He has decided to request a loan for 15,000 Lempiras to stock his store with merchandise such as cell phones, accessories, and things for cell phones.  He expects to increase his sales and earnings with the help of this loan.  His goal is for his son to be healthy, be able to attend school, and for his business to grow daily.

loans.use: to buy supplies and inventory.

loans.name: Laura Vanessa

texts.es: Laura, es una joven madre soltera de 38 años de edad, sola está intentando salir adelante con sus dos hijos quienes ya están grandes y estudian en un colegio público y muy pronto se tiene que preparar mas porque uno de ellos está por ingresar a la universidad y su sueño es verlos todos unos profesionales. Laura se dedica a la venta productos químicos de limpieza para el hogar, muchas veces carece de productos para vender por falta de recursos los cuales en su mayoría los destina para gastos del hogar pagos de colegios entre otros, por esta razón ella desea experimentar trabajar con  crédito el cual solicita para invertir en más productos químicos para continuar  vendiendo, siendo este su único medio de ingresos.
texts.en: Laura is a young, 38 year old, single mother.  She is only trying to get ahead with her two children who attend the public high school.  Soon she will have to be better prepared because one of them is about to begin university and her dream is to see them become professionals.  Laura sells cleaning chemicals for the home.  Many times she comes up short of chemicals due to lack of financial resources, most of which she uses to pay household expenses and to pay school expenses.  She wants to try working with a loan, so she is asking for a loan to buy more products so she can continue making sales.  This is her only source of income.

loans.use: to buy cleaning supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Berta Lidia

texts.es: Berta, tiene 42 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Hace 12 años que doña Berta estableció su propio negocio de pulpería donde vende  productos básicos alimenticios y venta de comida. vende granos básicos, manteca, huevo, azúcar, jabón, pan, refrescos, carnes, churros, lácteos etcEste negocio lo tiene en su casa al que le dedica todo el dia. ha mantenido varios prestamos con ODEF, actualmente solicita el ciclo numero 25, que es por un monto de 5,000 lempiras, con el cual va surtir la pulpería con productos como granos básicos, manteca, huevo, azúcar, refrescos, carnes, churros, lácteos etc. Ella espera que su negocio tenga estabilidad económica en un futuro.
texts.en: Berta is 42 years old, a widow, and has three children.  She lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes.  12 years ago Berta set us her own business, a convenience store where she sells basic foods and prepared food.  She sells basic grains, lard, eggs, sugar, soap, bread, soft drinks, churros, milk products, etc.  She runs her business out of her home and tends to it all day.  She has had several loans through ODEF, is now in her 25th cycle and is asking for 5,000 lempiras which she will use to stock her store.  She hopes that the will have financial stability in the future.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Iveth Magadalena

texts.es:
La  Joven Iveth, de 28 años, vive en su casa de habitación en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, en la zona sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 05  años a la venta de refrescos y golosinas.
Iveth tiene su negocio  ubicado en su casa, sus clientes son los vecinos y amigos que a diario le visitan
Iveth está solicitando  el crédito para la compra de cajas de refrescos, cebollas, chiles, plátanos verdes, papas, quesos, salsas, tomates, etc. y todo lo que necesita para preparar su venta y también para comprar al por mayor y almacenarlo porque le venden los productos más cómodos de esta manera.
Iveth espera poder obtener más ganancias en su negocio y su sueño es comprarse una freidora de pollo.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril del 2013.
texts.en:
Iveth is a 28 year old young woman.  She lives in her house in the San Lorenzo community in the southern part of Honduras.  She has been selling soft drinks and snacks for five years.  Iveth’s business is located in her house.  Her customers are her neighbors and friends who visit her daily.

Iveth is requesting the loan to buy cases of soft drinks, onions, chilies, green bananas, potatoes, cheeses, salsas, and tomatoes, etc.  She will buy everything that she needs in order to prepare for her sales.  She will buy wholesale and store it because they sell the products for better prices this way.

Iveth hopes to be able to get more profits in her business.  Her dream is to buy a chicken fryer.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – April 2013

loans.use: to buy cases of soft drinks, onions, chilies, green bananas, potatoes, cheeses, salsas, and tomatoes, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To do finishing work to the outside of his house.
